kit.leader_skill: "Resurrected Warriors" or "Planetary Destruction" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%

super_attack.name: Barrage Death Beam (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn,; causes colossal damage to enemy; and lowers ATK & DEF

ultra_super_attack.name: Golden Death Blaster (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK and; raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Impact of the New Form
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry: (Once) Guards all attacks for 1 turn; (Once) DEF 100% up for 3 turns; (Once) Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 90% up; (Once) Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 10% down for every 2 turns passed (no more than -60%); (Once) Ki +6 and ATK & DEF 200% up; When HP is 50% or more: ATK & DEF 200% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; For every Super Attack performed: (Forever) Ki +1 (up to +3); (Forever) DEF 30% up (up to 150%); For every attack received: (Forever) Ki +1 (up to +3); (Forever) ATK 30% up (up to 150%); Starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle: (Once) ATK 300% up and performs a critical hit when HP is 50% or less; Starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle: ATK & DEF 100% up when attacking as the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn; Starting from the 7th turn from the start of battle: ATK & DEF 100% up when attacking as the 3rd attacker in a turn

lines.context: Starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle

lines.text: ATK & DEF 100% up when attacking as the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn
lines.context: Starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle

lines.text: ATK & DEF 100% up when attacking as the 3rd attacker in a turn
lines.context: Starting from the 7th turn from the start of battle

active_skill.name: Earth Breaker
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily; Causes mega-colossal damage to all enemies
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 50% or less starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle (once only)
